name: Anthony Towns
cooked: yeah, chunking means that suffix-pays-for-prefix. (could be equal rather than higher, depending on whether chunking is maximal or minimal) [edit: i guess we always want minimal – as if we have two chunks of the same feerate, it’s easy to combine them when building a block, but much harder to split a chunk]
